room_title: Escape room "Pirates" by Urban Escape Games in Atlanta
review: This was such an amazing room. It was our first escape but we will definitely be back. The flow was one of if not the best we have done and set design was awesome.

room_title: Escape room "Pirates" by Urban Escape Games in Atlanta
review: This room was amazing. From the set design and flow of the puzzles everything goes very well together and the only downside is that we wished we could keep playing after we completed the room! This was so much fun!

room_title: Escape room "Pirates" by Urban Escape Games in Atlanta
review: Great rooms! Definitely recommend doing the competition rooms and competing for the gold with friends! We brought our kids and it’s  kid friendly!

room_title: Escape room "Pirates" by Urban Escape Games in Atlanta
review: Great rooms and customer service! The competition rooms were a ton of fun!! We loved the attention to detail and amazing puzle flow.

room_title: Escape room "Pirates" by Urban Escape Games in Atlanta
review: This place was amazing! They are newer in Georgia but recently acquired a second location they plan to update as well and I can't wait to see the new rooms at both locations!

room_title: Escape room "Pirates" by Urban Escape Games in Atlanta
review: We went as a group and did the pirate room. We loved the set up. Very well done. The owners are friendly and helpful. We escaped! And are excited to go back and try out their other rooms!

room_title: Escape room "Pirates" by Urban Escape Games in Atlanta
review: We had a group of 6 and escaped from the pirate room. Very original and fun setup! Cant wait to go back!

room_title: Escape room "Pirates" by Urban Escape Games in Atlanta
review: The attention to detail in the rooms is incredible. We did the Pirate room and all loved it. We can’t wait to go back and try the other rooms!
